text: O vy, kotoryye uverovali! Ne upodoblyaytes' tem, kotoryye ne uverovali i skazali o svoikh brat'yakh, otpravivshikhsya v dorogu [po delam] ili zhe v pokhod: "Yesli by oni ostalis' s nami, to ne umerli by i ne byli by ubity". Ved' Allakh sdelal podobnyye [setovaniya] prichinoy pechali v ikh serdtsakh. Allakh - tot, kto ozhivlyayet i umershchvlyayet, i Allakh vidit to, chto vy vershite
